Positive crossmatch kidney transplant ( T cell crossmatch > 100 , B flow cytometric crossmatch > 150 ) . Simultaneous kidney extrarenal organ transplant include pancreas , liver , heart , lung , etc . Subjects previous extra renal transplant may include study . Patients take chronic anticoagulation , include Coumadin , Plavix type heparin . Aspirin acceptable must stop 5 day prior renal biopsy .
